text_block_list.text:
The pranks from Shinko Windy continued unabated, 
but I eventually understood something. And that was―
Shinko Windy falls back in to 2nd place……!
text_block_list.name: Event Announcer

text_block_list.text: Wahahahahahaha! You fell for it, you fell for it～!
text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy

text_block_list.text: Shinko Windy challenged for the lead, but fell one step short……!
text_block_list.name: Event Announcer

text_block_list.text:
Gyahahahahaha!! I surprised you, I surprised you! 
Hey hey! Come and get me～!
text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy

text_block_list.text:
On the days she lost races, she would definitely come 
and play pranks on me. After seeing me be surprised, a big 
smile would be on her face.

Shinko Windy would vent her frustration 
from losing by playing pranks on people.

Waa haa haa haa haa! Once again, today you'll 
fall prey to Windy-chan's twisted machinations!
text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy

text_block_list.text:
It'd be nice if after relieving her stress 
through pranks she'd get to training――
! Ehehee!
text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy

text_block_list.text: Windy-chan won't be stopped by anyone!
text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy

text_block_list.text:
After I had realized that, 
I did my best to react in an appropriate way.

Ni shi shi shi! It went well yesterday, it went well! 
That person is really interesting!
text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy

text_block_list.text:
And whenever they look at Windy-chan, their eyes go wide……! 
Ukukukukuu! What should I do next time～!?
text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy

text_block_list.text:
And so the days continued on like that…… until one day. 
I had to take leave from the school for additional training.

Kufuu, kufufufufuu! 
I've got a special prank for you today. It'll shock you for sure.
text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy

text_block_list.text: Hm? What's this? A note?
text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy

text_block_list.text:
………… 
『Away for additional training――』……
text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy

text_block_list.text: ……Hmmmm～
text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy

text_block_list.text:
The training was stricter and took more time than I thought. 
Before I knew it, several weeks had passed――
Finally, I was eventually able to return to school. On that day―

No way, no way, no way! 
If I say I'm not entering, then I'm not entering!
text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy

text_block_list.text:
But, if you keep skipping Selection Races, 
eventually it'll eventually lead to you dropping out――
text_block_list.name: Instructor

text_block_list.text:
Shut up! 
I'm done with this, all of it, I'm quitting～!
text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy

text_block_list.text:
Ah! 
Wait, Shinko Windy!
text_block_list.name: Instructor

text_block_list.text:
……Well, these past few weeks her boycotts 
and pranks have gotten more extreme.
text_block_list.name: Instructor

text_block_list.text:
It's the same with her classes, but she won't enter Selection 
Races. And I just now asked her why, but it seems she can't 
properly put it in to words.
text_block_list.name: Instructor

text_block_list.text:
……and more than anything, her pranks…… 
take a look at that wall.
text_block_list.name: Instructor

text_block_list.text:
I looked to where she pointed…… A large self-portrait was 
spray-painted on the wall of the school.

This is also partly our fault. The level of her pranks 
was starting to get out of hand, so we wanted to stop her 
before something big happened.
text_block_list.name: Instructor

text_block_list.text:
Since our reactions seemed to make her overjoyed, 
we did our best to try and respond by remaining calm――
text_block_list.name: Instructor

text_block_list.text: But, that just seemed to make things worse……!
text_block_list.name: Instructor

text_block_list.text:
……Haa…… At the very least, if things could calm down 
and we could talk it out, it would be nice……
text_block_list.name: Instructor

text_block_list.text:
Before I went away for training, 
the pranks weren't anything more than just minor mischief.

Unable to just stand idly by, I chased after Shinko Windy. 
She was…… standing in a corner behind the school building.

………… 
……Hmph. This is fine.
text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy

text_block_list.text: ……races, and pranks too…… they aren't fun.
text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy

text_block_list.text:
I might have misunderstood. I had thought it was just 
restlessness caused by being unable to win, but――
After all, nobody's even watching me……
text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy

text_block_list.text:
『I want to watch Windy-chan more』, 
that was the thought that was in the back of my mind.
